alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Lucie County through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saint Lucie Airport, or over Indrio. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Indrio, Fort Pierce Inlet, Queens Cove, and Fort Pierce North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
